meanings.sent1: She felt tweaky before the big test.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise made him feel tweaky.
meanings.sent3: His tweaky reaction to the surprise party was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The tweaky cat jumped at the sudden movement.
meanings.sent5: The tweaky squirrel darted up the tree at the sound of footsteps.

meanings.definition: (adverb) in a nervous or agitated manner
meanings.sent1: She looked around tweaky during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: He walked tweaky through the dark alley.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked tweaky at the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The leaves rustled tweaky in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The child whispered tweaky to avoid waking the baby.

meanings.definition: (verb) to make small adjustments or improvements
meanings.sent1: He liked to tweaky his bike before each race.
meanings.sent2: She tweakyed the recipe to make it healthier.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic tweakyed the engine to run more smoothly.
meanings.sent4: She tweakyed the essay to perfect her argument.
meanings.sent5: He tweakyed the settings on his camera for better photos.
